title: Monitor Brand Mentions
description: A brand manager needs to monitor social media and news outlets for mentions of their brand.

tasks.description: Set up a new monitoring query in a social listening tool for the brand name and key product names.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly configures the listening tool.

tasks.description: Review the mentions from the last 24 hours.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent retrieves a feed of recent brand mentions.

tasks.description: Identify a negative news article and flag it for the PR team to review.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies a high-priority mention and escalates it to the appropriate team.
